text: Iadɨ 1.20 Lom 8.26-27, Ef 6.18, Kl 2.7, 1 Te 5.11 mukɨlagali namɨlaŋ uamalɨ. Namɨlaŋ Asɨ dɨ amɨŋ ciaŋ agasaŋ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lamɨkalaŋ uamalɨ. Haman lɨdalaŋ naludɨ hɨji vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ agɨlaŋ nalusaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ iguavɨdaci vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ lagulamɨdɨlaŋ uamalɨ. Lɨdalaŋ Asɨ dɨ Amɨŋ agaŋ nalusaŋ vɨdɨvɨdɨŋ igudaci namɨlaŋ Asɨ dɨ aba aba pam hɨnikalaŋ uamalɨ.
